crossing.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a place where you can safely cross a road, railway, river etc
crossing.translation[0].definitions[0].e: You must give way to any pedestrians on the crossing.
crossing.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a place where two lines, roads, tracks etc cross
crossing.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Turn left at the first crossing.
crossing.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a journey across the sea, a lake, or a river
